alert.note: Alert for Lee; Terrell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 3:55PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lee and southeastern Terrell Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 354 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dawson, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Leesburg, Dawson, Albany, Sasser, Forrester, Bridges Crossroad, Palmyra, Century, Herod, Jordan Place, Clarks Mill, Dawson Municipal A/P, Byne Crossroads, Armena, Neyami and Chickasawhatchee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for southwestern Georgia.
